article.title: Sikorsky to Support Advanced Blackhawk for Swedish Armed Forces
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Sikorsky Aircraft Corporation, Stratford, Connecticut, was awarded a $41,906,702 firm-fixed-price contract modification to procure integrated logistics support, program management, aircraft warranty, maintenance manpower and software loading to support the 15 UH-60MÂ "Green" aircraft procured for the Swedish Armed Forces. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
